sentences.english: Will insulin analogs improve my diabetes treatment plan?

sentences.english: Most children were not allowed to check blood glucose levels or administer insulin in class.

sentences.english: The main pathophysiological changes of patients with PCOS are insulin resistance, hyperinsulinemia and hyperandrogenism.

sentences.english: This suggests that resistin gene expression is not correlated with insulin resistance.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of the use of continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion(CSII) in diabetic patients in paraoperation period.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the protective effects of insulin on smoke inhalation injury in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胰岛素对烟雾吸入性损伤大鼠肺的保护作用。
